name: Bart Allen Trivia Game | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Bart suffered from an extremely high metabolism. When he was two years old, how old did he appear to be?
questions.explanation:
Twelve.

	A race with Wally West cured Bart of this condition, but not before it became obvious that Bart had no real-life experience.

questions.text: Initially, Bart was raised in a virtual reality world.
questions.explanation:
True.

	To keep him from going mad due to knowledge of his metabolic disorders, Bart was raised in a virtual reality world that kept pace with his own rapid growth. Iris Allen rescued him from the machine.

questions.text: Which super-speedster raised Bart and moved him to Alabama?
questions.explanation:
Max Mercury.

	Max Mercury was given charge of the hyperactive Bart when he proved to be too much for Wally West, the Flash at the time. Mercury is a time-hopping superhero who has lived in several decades.

Batman.

	In the fiftieth issue of Impulse's own comic series, the reader learned that this was a warning, not a compliment. Batman believed that Bart was too impulsive in his actions.

questions.text: Bart Allen was a founding member of the team Young Justice.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Young Justice was founded by three teenaged superheroes: Robin, Superboy and Impulse. Young Justice was a team of teenaged superheroes, the Teen Titans having been renamed the Titans and consisting of adult superheroes.

Deathstroke.

	Deathstroke was under the control of Jericho at the time. During his recovery, Bart read every single book in the San Francisco Public Library.

questions.text: Bart Allen appeared in the "Titans Tomorrow" alternate timeline. Who was his paramour?
questions.explanation:
Rose Wilson.

	Rose Wilson is the daughter of Slade Wilson, also known as Deathstroke. To be like her father, Rose plucked out her own eye, and fights under the name of Ravager.

questions.text: When Bart kidnapped Superboy-Prime into the Speed Force, how long did he spend in an alternate Keystone City?
questions.explanation:
Four Years.

	Bart lived in an alternate version of Keystone City with Max Mercury, Barry Allen and Wally West. To get back to the regular timeline, Bart Allen absorbed the Speed Force.

questions.text: Bart reappeared from the Speed Force in which city?
questions.explanation:
Tokyo.

	Bart returned from the Speed Force to warn other heroes about the escaped Superboy-Prime. He also helped fight dozens of super-villains in the Battle of Metropolis.

questions.text: After defeating the Griffin, Bart left Keystone City for which other locale?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	Bart is referred to as "kind of retired" by Tim Drake, and left Jay Garrick as the city's sole protector. Bart had been working as an auto mechanic.
